submit.multipart_title: Send a large archive in parts Telegram accepts up to {limit} per document. Split your ZIP before uploading.
submit.multipart_windows:
Windows + 7-Zip:
set ‚ÄúSplit to volumes, bytes‚Äù = {limit_mb}M for {sample}. Rename the outputs to {sample}.part001, {sample}.part002, ‚Ä¶
submit.multipart_upload: Send each part as a separate document in order: {sample}.part001, {sample}.part002, ‚Ä¶
submit.multipart_concat: We reassemble via cat {sample}.part* > {sample}. The wildcard expands lexicographically, so numbering with leading zeros keeps the correct order.
submit.multipart_ask_total: How many parts will you send? Reply with a number between 2 and 20.
submit.multipart_invalid_total: Please send a number between 2 and 20.

submit.multipart_missing_setup: Multipart upload session reset. Press ‚ÄúSend in parts‚Äù to start again.
